V03vinv15_u:56: upasaṃpannān bhikṣavo mayā sandhāyoktaṃ no tu śrāmaṇerakān iti

V03vinv15_u:103: yan nu vayaṃ yathāvṛddhikāṃ prajñapayema iti;
V03vinv15_u:104: te parasparaṃ saṃjalpaṃ kartum ārabdhā iti;
V03vinv15_u:107: bhavantaḥ eṣa vaṭavṛkṣaḥ kena kiyatpramāṇo dṛṣṭa iti;

V03vinv15_u:128: yadā viṣamanimnāḥ pradeśā gantavyā bhavanti tadā hastinaṃ markaṭo 'bhirohati markaṭam śaśaḥ śaśam api kapiṃjalaḥ

V03vinv15_u:130: asti vayaṃ bhavantaḥ pravṛddhasnehāḥ sagauravāś ca; anyad api (MSV III 127)
V03vinv15_u:131: tāvat kiṃcit kuśalaṃ samādāya vartema iti;
V03vinv15_u:138: tad asmābhir adyāgreṇa saprāṇakāni parityajya niṣprāṇakāni;

V03vinv15_u:147: te saparigrahāṇi parityajya niṣparigrahāṇi paribhoktum ārabdhāḥ

V03vinv15_u:155: tad asmābhir adyāgreṇa gamyaiva gantavyā nāgamyā te gamyāṃ gacchanti nāgamyām.

V03vinv15_u:174: te mādanīyāni phalāni parityajyamādanīyāni phalāni paribhoktum ārabdhāḥ
V03vinv15_u:175: yadā te pañcasu vratapadeṣu pratiṣṭhāpitās tadā kapiṃjalaḥ kathayati:
V03vinv15_u:176: asti vayaṃ bhavantaḥ paṃcasu vratapadeṣu pratiṣṭhitāḥ;
V03vinv15_u:177: yan nu vayam anyān api paṃcasu vratapadeṣu pratiṣṭhāpayāmaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:184: ahaṃ sarvān śaśān lomaśān mṛgāṃś ca pratiṣṭhāpayāmi;
V03vinv15_u:186: ahaṃ sarvān hastinaḥ siṃhān vyāghradvīpinaś ca pratiṣṭhāpayāmi;
V03vinv15_u:188: yady evam etat saṃkṣepād yuṣmākam avinayā apadā dvipadāś catuṣpadāḥ pakṣiṇaś ca tān ahaṃ sarvān paṃcasu vratapadeṣu pratiṣṭhāpayāmīti [Śay-v_8]
V03vinv15_u:190: yāvattiryagyonigatāḥ prāṇinas te sarve paṃcasu vratapadeṣu pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ;
V03vinv15_u:191: te anyonyam avyābādhamānās tasmin vanaṣaṇḍe saṃprajānadvihāriṇo yatheṣṭaṃ viharanti;
V03vinv15_u:195: te manuṣyair dṛṣṭā anyonyam avyābādhamānā viharantaḥ,
V03vinv15_u:199: ahaṃ dharmeṇa rājyaṃ kārayāmi mamaiṣo 'nubhāva iti;
V03vinv15_u:200: antaḥpuraṃ kumārāmātyā bhaṭabalāgraṃ naigamajānapadāś ca ḥkathayanti;
V03vinv15_u:203: sarva ete kathayanti mamānubhāvo mamānubhāva iti;
V03vinv15_u:208: tatra pañcābhijña riṣiḥ prativasati sakalasya vārāṇasīnivāsino janakāyasya pūjyo mānyo 'bhivādyaś ca;
V03vinv15_u:209: tato rājā tasya ṛṣeḥ sakāśam upasaṃkrāntaḥ pādayor nipatya kathayati:
V03vinv15_u:210: maharṣe mama vijite yāvattityagyonigatāḥ prāṇinas te sarve anyonyam avyābādhamānāḥ saṃprajānadvihāriṇo yatheṣṭaṃ viharanti;
V03vinv15_u:211: devaḥ kālavarṣī sadā puṣpaphalā vṛkṣāḥ śasyavatī ca vasumatī;
V03vinv15_u:215: antaḥpuraṃ kumārāmātyā bhaṭabalāgraṃ naigamajānapadāś ca saṃlakṣayanti:
V03vinv15_u:217: tan na jñāyate kasyāyam anubhāva iti;
V03vinv15_u:222: mahārāja ma tavaiṣo 'nubhāvo nāntaḥpurasya na kumārāṇāṃ nāmātyānāṃ na bhaṭabalāgrasya na (MSV IV 130)
V03vinv15_u:224: api tu tava vijite catvāraḥ prāniṇaḥ prativasanti;
V03vinv15_u:229: mahārāja kiṃ tava tair dṛṣṭair api tu yat te samādāya vartante tat samādāya vartasveti; kiṃ

V03vinv15_u:242: kumārā amātyā bhaṭabalāgraṃ naigamajānapadā api pañca vratapadāni samādaya vartitum ārabdhāni;
V03vinv15_u:244: rājā brahmadattaḥ pañca vratapadāni samādāya vartate sārdham antaḥpureṇa kumārair amātyair bhaṭabalāgrair naigamajānapadair iti;
V03vinv15_u:245: śrutvā ca punas te 'pi pañcavratapadāni [A_316b] samādaya vartitum ārabdhāḥ sārdham antaḥpureṇa kumārair amātyair bhaṭabalāgrair naigamajānapadair iti;
V03vinv15_u:246: bhūyasā sarva eva janakāyaḥ pañca vratapadāni samādāya vartitum ārabdhaḥ
V03vinv15_u:247: tena khalu samayena jambūdvīpe yaḥ kālaṃ karoti sa kāyasya bhedāt praṇīteṣu deveṣū trayastriṃśeṣūpapadyate;
V03vinv15_u:248: tataḥ śakro devendraḥ āpūryamāṇaṃ devaparṣadaṃ dṛṣṭvā ca punar gāthāṃ bhāṣate; (MSV III 131)

V03vinv15_u:257: The Buddha eulogises the order by age
V03vinv15_u:258: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣavaḥ sagauravā viharata sapratīṣāḥ sabhayavaśavartinaḥ sabrahmacāriṣu sthavireṣu madhyeṣu navakeṣu;
V03vinv15_u:260: sa tāvad bhikṣavo bhikṣur agauravo viharann apratīśaḥ abhayavaśavartī sthavireṣu madhyeṣu navakeṣu āsamudācārikān dharmān paripūrayiṣyati nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate;
V03vinv15_u:261: āsamudācārikān dharmān aparipūrya śaikṣān dharmān paripūrayiṣyati nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate;
V03vinv15_u:262: śaikṣān dharmān aparipūrya śīlaskandhaṃ samādhiskandhaṃ prajñāskandhaṃ vimuktiskandhaṃ vimuktijñānadarśanaskandhaṃ paripūrayiṣyati nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate;
V03vinv15_u:263: vimuktijñānadarśanaskandham aparipūryānupādāya [Śay-v_10] parinirvāsyati nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate;
V03vinv15_u:264: sa tāvad bhikṣavo bhikṣuḥ sagauravo viharan sapratīśaḥ sabhayavaśavartī brahmacāriṣu sthavireṣu madhyeṣu navakeṣu āsamudācārikān dharmān pūrayiṣyati (MSV III 132)
V03vinv15_u:266: āsamudācārikān dharmān paripūrya śaikṣān dharmān paripūrayiṣyati sthānam etad vidyate;
V03vinv15_u:267: śaikṣān dharmān paripūrya śīlaskandhaṃ samādhiskandhaṃ prajñāskandhaṃ vimuktiskandhaṃ vimuktijñānadarśanaskandhaṃ paripūrayiṣyati sthānam etad vidyate;
V03vinv15_u:268: vimuktijñānadarśanaskandhaṃ paripūryānupādāya parinirvāsyati sthānam etad vidyate;
V03vinv15_u:270: yat sagauravā vihariṣyāmaḥ sapratīśāḥ sabhayavaśavartinaḥ ḥsabrahmacāriṣūḥ sthavireṣu madhyeṣu navakeṣu:
V03vinv15_u:274: yadā bhagavatā pañcakā vinītās te araṇye prativasanti;
V03vinv15_u:275: te araṇye prativasanto āgamyā bhavanti siṃhānāṃ vyāghrāṇāṃ dvīpināṃ tarakṣūṇām
V03vinv15_u:277: kutra pūrvakāṇāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ śrāvakā āvāsaṃ kalpitavantaḥ?
V03vinv15_u:280: tena khalu samayena vārāṇasyāṃ kalayāṇabhadro nāma gṛhapatiḥ prativasati;
V03vinv15_u:282: aho batāhaṃ bhagavataḥ śrāvakāṇaṃ vihāraṃ kārayeyam iti;
V03vinv15_u:283: sa kālyam evotthāya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:284: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau [A_317a] śirasā vanditvaikānte niṣaṇṇaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:285: ekāntaniṣaṇṇaṃ kalyāṇabhadrikaṃ gṛhapatiṃ bhagavān dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati;
V03vinv15_u:288: atha kalyāṇabhadriko gṛhapatir utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṃgaṃ kṛtvā yena bhagavāṃs tenāṃjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantam ieam avocat:
V03vinv15_u:289: yadi bhagavān anujānīyād ahaṃ bhagavataḥ śrāvakāṇāṃ vihāraṃ karayeyam iti;
V03vinv15_u:292: sa na jānīte kīdṛśaḥ kārayitavya iti;
V03vinv15_u:294: yadi trilayanaṃ kārayasi madhye gandhakuṭiḥ kārayitavyā dvayoḥ pārśvayor dve layane;
V03vinv15_u:298: sa na jānīte kati purāḥ kartavyā iti;
V03vinv15_u:300: bhikṣūṇāṃ pañcapurā vihārāḥ kartavyāḥ saptapurā gandhakuṭiḥ;
V03vinv15_u:308: tena khalu samayena śrāvastyāṃ datto nāma gṛhapatiḥ prativasati āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhoga vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī;
V03vinv15_u:310: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati;
V03vinv15_u:313: sā cāṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā;
V03vinv15_u:315: tasya trīṇi saptakāny ekaviṃśatidivasān vistareṇa jātasya jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate;
V03vinv15_u:318: ayaṃ dārako dattasya gṛhapateḥ putras tasmād bhavatu dārakasya sudatta iti nāmeti;
V03vinv15_u:325: so 'ṣṭābhir dhātrībhir unnīyate vardhate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpirmaṇḍenānyaiś cottaptottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣair āśu vardhate hradastham iva paṃkajam;
V03vinv15_u:326: so 'pareṇa samayena sarvālaṃkāravibhūṣito dhātryaṃsagato niṣaṇṇo bahirnirgataḥ;
V03vinv15_u:344: āryaputra yady evaṃ nainaṃ bhūyo 'py alaṃkariṣyāmi;
V03vinv15_u:346: bhadre asty asmākaṃ suvarṇam aprameyaṃ ratnāni ca;
V03vinv15_u:350: yāvad apareṇa samayena datto gṛhapatir bhṛtyajanaparivṛto (MSV III 135)
V03vinv15_u:375: tatas tenobhau pāṇī nadyām āplāvya suvarṇapūrṇās catvāro lohasaṃghāṭā uddhṛtāḥ; kathayati:
V03vinv15_u:376: tāta atas tnaṃ yāvadāptaḥṃḥ dhanena dhanakāryaṃ kṛtvāvaśiṣṭam atraiva plāvaya;
V03vinv15_u:377: putra kiṃ tvaṃ jalagatān nidhīn paśyasi?
V03vinv15_u:378: tāta na kevalaṃ jalagatān sthalagatān api sasvāmikān asvāmikān api ye 'pi dūre ye 'py antike;
V03vinv15_u:380: śakyam evaṃvidhena dānaptinā dānaṃ dātum iti viditvā kathayati:
V03vinv15_u:381: putra yady evaṃ dehi dānaṃ yatheṣṭam iti;
V03vinv15_u:383: na tāvat putro yaśasvī bhavati yāvad asya pitā jīvatīti
V03vinv15_u:384: yāvad apareṇa samayena datto gṛhapatiḥ kālagataḥ;
V03vinv15_u:386: satatam anāthebhyaḥ piṇḍakam anuprayacchatīti samantāc chadbo visṛtaḥ:
V03vinv15_u:387: dattasya gṛhapateḥ putraḥ sudatto gṛhasvāmī saṃvrṭtaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:391: tatas tena sadṛśāt kulāt kalatram ānitaṃ;
V03vinv15_u:392: sa tayā sārdham krīḍati ramate paricārayati;
V03vinv15_u:393: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ putro jātaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:399: sa kare kapolaṃ datvā cintāpro vyavasthitaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:403: kasmāt tvaṃ gṛhapate kare kapolaṃ datvā cintāparas tiṣṭhasīti;
V03vinv15_u:406: saptamasya sujātasya sadṛśakulaṃ cintayāmi katarat tat kulaṃ yato 'sya niveṣaṃ kariṣyāmīti;
V03vinv15_u:408: alpotsukas tiṣṭha aham asya sadṛśaṃ kulaṃ gaveṣayāmi;
V03vinv15_u:414: rājagṛhe anyatamo gṛhapatir āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo 'nāthapiṇḍadasya pratirūpaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:415: sa tasya gṛhaṃ praviṣṭo dvāraśālāyāṃ sthitvā kathayati:
V03vinv15_u:421: śrāvastyām anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatis tasya putraḥ sujāto nāmnā;
V03vinv15_u:425: śatam aśvānāṃ śataṃ niṣkāṇāṃ śatam aśvatarīrathānāṃ śataṃ kāmbojikānāṃ kanyānām iti;
V03vinv15_u:428: tenāpi vācayitvā pratīccha sarvaṃ mayā deyam iti;
V03vinv15_u:430: tatas taiḥ śucinā praṇītena prabhūtenāhāreṇa saṃtarpito mānavakaḥ śālāṃ gatvā vāsam upagato viṣūcitaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:432: sa tair aśucibhayād bahir niṣkāsayitvā cchoritaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:433: daivād āyuṣmantau śāriputramaudgalyāyanau taṃ pradeśam āgatau;
V03vinv15_u:435: tatas tābhyāṃ vaṃśavidalikayā nirlikhya pāṇḍumṛttikayā udvartya snāpitaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:438: sa tayor antike cittam abhiprasādya kālagataḥ;
V03vinv15_u:440: sa vaiśravaṇasya mahārājasya sakāśaṃ gatvā bhavanaṃ prārthayate;
V03vinv15_u:442: gaccha tad eva te śivikādvāraṃ bhavanam iti;
V03vinv15_u:444: videharājena rājño biṃbisārasya haimavatānāṃ nāgānāṃ sātam anupreṣitam;
V03vinv15_u:446: mama videharājena haimavatānāṃ nāgānāṃ śatam anupreṣitam;
V03vinv15_u:448: anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir yena rājā prasenajit kosalas tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:449: upasaṃkramya rājānaṃ prasenajitaṃ kosalam idam avocat:
V03vinv15_u:453: śobhanaṃ gaccha mamāpi tasmāt hastiśatam āneyaṃ (MSV III 138)
V03vinv15_u:456: deva yadi mama tatra prayojanaṃ ḥnaḥ bhavati grahīṣyāmīti;
V03vinv15_u:462: tato 'nāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatiḥ prabhūtaṃ kulaśulkam ādāya rājagṛhaṃ gataḥ;
V03vinv15_u:463: sa yasya gṛhapater gṛhe vāsam upagataḥ sa gṛhapatiḥ sarātram evotthāyāntarjanam āmaṃtrayate:
V03vinv15_u:471: kiṃ punar asya gṛhapater āvāho vā vivāho vā bhaviṣyati;
V03vinv15_u:473: śreṇī vā, pūgo vā parṣado vā?
V03vinv15_u:474: rājā vānena māgadhaḥ śreṇyo bimbisāraḥ bhaktenopanimantritaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:475: iti viditvā taṃ gṛhapatim idam avocat:
V03vinv15_u:476: kiṃ punas te gṛhapate āvāho vā bhaviṣyati,
V03vinv15_u:477: vivāho vā rāṣṭraṃ vā tvayā bhaktenopanimantritaṃ śreṇī vā pūgo vā parṣado vā rājā vā te māgadhaḥ śreṇyo bimbisāro bhaktenopanimantrita iti;
V03vinv15_u:479: gṛhapate na me āvāho bhaviṣyati na vivāho vā nāpi mayā rāṣṭraṃ bhaktenopanimantritaṃ,
V03vinv15_u:480: na śreṇī na pūgo na parṣado nāpi rājā māgadhaḥ śreṇyo bimbisāro bhaktenopanimantritaḥ api tu buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṃgho bhaktenopanimantrita;
V03vinv15_u:481: iti anāthapaiṇḍadasya gṛhapater buddha ity aśrutapūrvaṃ ghoṣaṃ śrutvā sarvaromakūpāny [A_318b] āhṛṣṭāni;
V03vinv15_u:482: sa āhṛṣṭaromakūpas taṃ gṛhapatim idam avocat:
V03vinv15_u:484: asti gṛhapate śramaṇo [Śay-v_15] gautamaḥ śākyaputraḥ (MSV III 139)
V03vinv15_u:485: śākyakulāt keśaśmaśrū avatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇy ācchādya samyag eva śraddhayā agārād anagārikāṃ pravrajitaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:489: santi gṛhapate kṣatriyakulād api kulaputrāḥ keśaśmaśrū avatārya kāṣāyāṇy vastrāṇy ācchādya samyag eva śraddhayā agārād anāgārikāṃ tam eva bhagavantaṃ pravrajitam anupravrajitāḥ;
V03vinv15_u:490_0: brāhmaṇakulād api vaiśyakulād api śūdrakulād api kulaputrāḥ keāśaśmaśrū avatārya
V03vinv15_u:490_1: kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇi ācchādya samyag eva śraddhayā anāgārād anāgārikāṃ tam eva bhagavantaṃ
V03vinv15_u:492: ḥśvaḥḥ sa mayā buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṅgho 'ntargṛhe bhaktenopanimantritaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:493: kutra gṛhapate sa bhagavān etarhi viharati?
V03vinv15_u:496: tena hi gṛhapate āgamaya tāvat tvam;
V03vinv15_u:497: sthānam etad vidyate yad ihāgataṃ śvo drakṣyasi;
V03vinv15_u:498: anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatis tāṃ rātriṃ buddhālambanayā smṛtyā middham avakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:500: tena khalu samayena śivakadvāraṃ rātryā dvau yāmau vivṛtaṃ tiṣṭhati;
V03vinv15_u:502: māhaiva āgantukānāṃ gamikānāṃ ca dūtānāṃ vighno bhaviṣyatīti;
V03vinv15_u:503: yāvat paśyati śivakadvāraṃ vivṛtam ālokena ca sphuṭam;
V03vinv15_u:507: iti viditvā tenaiva ālokena nagarān niṣkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:514: māhaiva kaścid viheṭayen manuṣyo vāmanuṣyo vā dhūrtako vā asaṃprāptam vā syāt prabhūtaṃ kulaśulkam iti;
V03vinv15_u:515: viditvā pratinivartitukāmo madhuskandhasya devaputrasya sthaṇḍilaṃ pradakṣiṇīkaroti,
V03vinv15_u:519: adyaivāyaṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantam apāsya anyadevatānamaskāraṃ kariṣyati;
V03vinv15_u:520: iti viditvā yāvacca śivakadvāraṃ yavac ca śītavanaṃ śmaśānam atrāntarād udāreṇāvabhāsenāvabhāsya anāthapiṇḍadaṃ gṛhapatim idam avocat:
V03vinv15_u:526: śatam aśvā śataṃ niṣkāḥ śatam aśvatarīrathāḥ /
V03vinv15_u:550: [A_319a] athānāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatis taṃ devaputram idam avocat:
V03vinv15_u:552: aham asmi gṛhapate madhuskandho nāma māṇavaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:554: so 'haṃ śāriputramaudgalyāyanayor bhikṣvor antike cittam abhiprasādya kālagataś cāturmahārājikeṣu deveṣūpapannaḥ,
V03vinv15_u:563: yatredānīṃ devatā api autsukyam āpadyante tasya bhagavato darśanāya;
V03vinv15_u:564: iti viditvā yena śītavanaṃ śmaśānaṃ tenopasaṅkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:565: tena khalu samayena bahir vihārasyābhyavakāśe bhagavān caṅkrameṇa caṅkramyate,
V03vinv15_u:567: adrākṣīd anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir bhagavantam durād eva;
V03vinv15_u:568: dṛṣṭvā ca punar yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṅkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:569: upasaṅkramya bhagavantam gṛhapatiḥ pratisaṃmodanayā pratisammodate: (MSV III 142)
V03vinv15_u:571: atha bhagavāṃs tasyāṃ velāyāṃ gāthā bhāṣate;
V03vinv15_u:572: sarvathā vai sukhaṃ śete brāhmaṇaḥ parinirvṛtaḥ / [Śay-v_17]
V03vinv15_u:573: lipyate yo na kāmair hi vipramukto nirupadhiḥ //
V03vinv15_u:576: atha bhagavān anāthapiṇḍadaṃ gṛhapatim ādāya vihāraṃ praviśya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:577: anāthapiṇḍado gṛhpatir bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:578: ekānte niṣaṇṇam anāthapiṇḍadaṃ gṛhapatiṃ bhagavān dharmyayā kathayā sandarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati,
V03vinv15_u:580: yāsau buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ pūrvakālakaraṇīyā dharmyā kathā,
V03vinv15_u:581: tadyathā dānakathā śīlakathā svargakathā kāmānām āsvādādīnavasaṃkleśavyavadānanaiṣkramyapraviveka anuśaṃsavyavadānapakṣyān dharmān vistareṇa saṃprakāśayati;
V03vinv15_u:582: yadā cainaṃ bhagavān adrākṣīt hṛṣṭacittaṃ kalyacittaṃ muditacittaṃ vinivaraṇacittaṃ bhavyaṃ pratibalaṃ sāmutkarṣikīṃ dharmadeśanām ājñātum,
V03vinv15_u:583: tadā yāsau buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ sāmutkarṣikī dharmadeśanā tadyathā duḥkhaṃ samudayo nirodho mārgaś catvāry āryasatyāni vistareṇa saṃprakāśayati;
V03vinv15_u:584: athānāthapiṇḍado gḥapatis tasminn evāsane niṣaṇṇaś catvaṛy āryasatyāny abhisameti;
V03vinv15_u:586: tasyathā śuddhaṃ vastram apagatakālakaṃ rañjanopagaṃ raṅge prakṣiptaṃ samyag eva raṅgaṃ pratigṛhṇāti,
V03vinv15_u:587: evam evānāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatis tasminn eva āsane niṣaṇṇaś catvāry āryasatyāny abhisameti;
V03vinv15_u:588: tadyathā duḥkhaṃ samudayo nirodho mārga iti;
V03vinv15_u:589: athānāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir dṛṣṭadharmā prāptadharmā viditadharmā (MSV III 143)
V03vinv15_u:590: paryavagāḍhadharmā tīrṇakāṅkṣo tīrṇavicikitsaḥ aparapratyayo 'nanyaneyaḥ śāstuś śāsane dharmeṣu vaiśāradyaprāptaḥ utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā,
V03vinv15_u:591: yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjalim praṇamya bhagavantam idam [A_319b] avocat;
V03vinv15_u:595: upāsakam māṃ ca dhāraya adyāgreṇa yāvajjīvaṃ prāṇopetaṃ śaraṇāgatam abhiprasannam;
V03vinv15_u:596: atha bhagavān anāthapiṇḍadaṃ gṛhapatim idam āvocat:
V03vinv15_u:600: tato mām anāthapiṇṣado gṛhapatir anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir iti janaḥ sañjānīte;
V03vinv15_u:602: [Śay-v_18] asti bhadanta prācīneṣu janapadeṣu śrāvastī nāma kosalānāṃ nigamaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:605: Anāthapiṇḍada invites the Buddha to Śrāvastī
V03vinv15_u:607: ahaṃ bhagavantam upasthāsyāmi yāvajjīvaṃ cīvarapiṇḍapātaglānapratyayabhaiṣaiyapariṣkāraiḥ sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṅghena;
V03vinv15_u:610: yatra gṛhapate vihārāḥ santi tatra bhikṣava āgantavyaṃ gantavyaṃ vastavyaṃ manyante;
V03vinv15_u:612: ahaṃ tathā kariṣyāmi yathā śrāvastyāṃ vihārā bhaviṣyanti;
V03vinv15_u:613: bhikṣavaś ca āgantavyaṃ gantavyaṃ vastavyaṃ maṃsyanta iti;
V03vinv15_u:615: anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir bhagavatas tūṣṇīṃbhāvenādhivāsanāṃ viditvā bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:616: tato 'sya yad rājagṛhe kṛtyaṃ vā karaṇīyaṃ vā tat sarvaṃ kṛtvā pariprāpya (MSV III 144)
V03vinv15_u:618: upasaṅkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:620: anuprayaccha me bhagavan bhikṣuṃ sahāyakan yena sahāyakena śrāvastyāṃ bhagavato 'rthāya vihāraṃ kārayāmīti;
V03vinv15_u:622: katarasya bhikṣor anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatiḥ saparivāro śrāvastīnivāsī ca janakāyo vidheyaḥ?
V03vinv15_u:625: samanvāhara śāriputra anāthapiṇḍadaṃ gṛhapatiṃ saparivāraṃ śrāvastīnivāsinaṃ ca janakāyam iti;
V03vinv15_u:627: athāyuṣmāṃś chāriputro bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt ptakrāntaḥ
V03vinv15_u:630: athāyuṣmāṃś chāriputras tasyā eva rātrer atyayāt pūrvāhṇe nivāsya,
V03vinv15_u:632: rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya caritvā kṛtabhaktakṛtyaḥ paścādbhaktapiṇḍapātapratikrānto yathāparibhuktaṃ śayanāsanaṃ pratiśamayya,
V03vinv15_u:635: athānāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatiḥ prabhūtaṃ śambalam ādāya ekaikarātrinivāsena śrāvastīm anuprāptaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:636: sa praviśann eva śrāvastīm ārāmeṇārāmam udyānenodyānam upavanenopavanaṃ caṅkramam anucaṅkramyamāṇo suvicarann evam āha:
V03vinv15_u:637: kataraḥ sa pṛthivīpradeśo bhaviṣyati śrāvastyā nātidūre [Śay-v_19] nātyāsanne divā alpākīrṇo 'lpavilāpo rātrāv alpaśabdo 'lpanirghoṣaḥ alpadaṃśamaśakavātātapasarīsṛpasaṃsparśaḥ,
V03vinv15_u:640: jetasya kumarasyārāmam śrāvastyā nātidūre nātyāsanne divā alpākīṇam alpavilāpaṃ rātrāv alpaśabdṃ alpanirghoṣaṃ alpadaṃśamaśakavātātapasarīsṛpasparśam;
V03vinv15_u:643: sa praviśann eva svaṃ niveśanaṃ yena jetaḥ kumāras tenopasaṅkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:646: ahaṃ tatra bhagavato 'rthāya vihāraṃ kārayāmi iti;
V03vinv15_u:650: dvir api trir apy anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir jetaṃ kumāram idam avocat:
V03vinv15_u:654: punar apy anāthapiṇḍado gṛhaptir jetaṃ kumaram idam avocat:
V03vinv15_u:660: tau kṛtārgho na kṛtargha iti vivādam āpannau,
V03vinv15_u:663: ayam anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir udyukto bhagavato 'rthāya vihāraṃ vihāraṃ māpayitum;
V03vinv15_u:667: anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir jetaś ca kumāro vyāvahārikasakāśam upasaṅkrāntau;
V03vinv15_u:668: athānāthapiṇḍako gṛhapatir vyāvahārikapuruṣāṇām etam arthaṃ vistareṇa nivedayati;
V03vinv15_u:674: anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatiḥ śakaṭair bhāraiḥ mūṭaiḥ piṭakair uṣṭrair gobhir gardabhaiḥ prabhūtaṃ suvarṇam abhinirhṛtya,
V03vinv15_u:678: tataḥ anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir etam arthaṃ cintayan muhūrtaṃ tūṣṇīm asthāt;
V03vinv15_u:681: nātiprabhūtaṃ yena ayam anāstīrṇaḥ pṛthivīpradeśaḥ āstariṣyati;
V03vinv15_u:685: kasmād ārāmakāraṇād iyantaṃ mahāntaṃ dhanaskandhaṃ parityajāmi;
V03vinv15_u:686: iti viditvā anāthapiṇḍadaṃ gṛhapatim idam [Śay-v_20] avocat;
V03vinv15_u:687: sacet te ha gṛhapate vipratisāraḥ pratīccha suvarṇam;
V03vinv15_u:690: api tv aham etam evārtham anucintayan muhūrtaṃ tūṣṇīm avasthitaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:698: yatredānīm ayaṃ gṛhapatir ārāmakāraṇād iyantaṃ mahāntaṃ dhanaskandhaṃ parityajati;

V03vinv15_u:1023: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātaḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv15_u:1024: kutra bhadantānāthapiṇḍadena gṛhapatināyaṃ pṛthivīpradeśaḥ pūrvakāṇāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ niryātitapūrvaḥ?

V03vinv15_u:1039: evam aham imam pṛthivīpradeśaṃ hiraṇyasuvarṇenāstīrya saptānāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ niryātayeyam;

V03vinv15_u:1047: syāt khalu yuṣmākaṃ bhikṣavo 'nyatamaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena puṣyo nāma grhapatir abhūd iti?
